long_description: With a relaxed fit as a cover-up or an extra layer over a sports bra, the Moving Comfort Metro T-Shirt for women uses moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric to keep you cool during practice. Raw-edge sleeves. The Moving Comfort Metro T-Shirt for women offers a relaxed fit.
short_description: With a relaxed fit as a cover-up or an extra layer over a sports bra, the Moving Comfort Metro T-Shirt for women uses moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric to keep you cool during practice.
